TextBlock.Text: YULE: We've done it, we created a planet!
RAVA: This is incredible! with this we could grow food and live with out Gearhaven's ecology collapsing!
YULE: The only thing left is to tune the gravity to match our home.
RAVA: Our friends back home will be ecstatic I'm sure. For now I'll go home and try my best to keep it together. when you finish, let us know immediately.
SOLA: Yule, come to the Control tower, we need to talk.
